name: API backwards compatibility
description: API Backwards Compatibility is key to successful cross-team feature development in agile and scalable projects

name: DevOps
description: Short and agile System Development Life cycle providing software quality and continuos deployment in Secure Software Supply Chain.

name: Event Sourcing
description: Event Sourcing is architecture approach that ensures that all changes to application state are stored as a sequence of events. It's key to successful auditable and secure application. This design pattern alow easy external system integration.

name: Microservice Solution
description: Based on client scope and high level architecture we successfully build Microservice Solutions for custom container based environments or for Service Fabric

name: Mobile PWA Application
description: Building responsive web applications as Mobile Progressive Web Application enable us to deliver close-to-native experience in mobile application development

name: Monolith Solutions
description: Monolith Applications are build for package delivery based on client scope and requirement. We can take advantage from Reference Architecture to ease the development.

name: MVC
description: Model-view-controlleris a design pattern commonly used divide the related program logic.

name: Reference Architecture
description: Reference Architecture is a code base with templates and packages that help us building non-functional components of each solution (like: logging, audit, identity, database access according to the environment security requirements, etc.).

name: REST API
description: The Representational state transfer (REST API) is commonly used in architectures we make to communicate with external systems or internally through our services

name: Secure Web applications
description: Building stable, redundant and secure Web Applications in Cloud and on Premis with application design, implementation, vulnerability testing, and monitoring according to member firms standarts and guidelines.

name: Software Delivery Guardrails
description: Empowering development teams to find, fix and prevent vulnerabilities related to source code, open source libraries, secret management and cloud configuration

name: Strong Security Policy
description: We meet the the security requiements set out by the Global Information Security Policies enforsing management directions and support for information security in accordance with business requirements and relevant laws and regulations.

name: Tailored Project Teams
description: Together with Business Development we build Tailored Project Teams customized for the client requirements and scope of the project.

name: Delivery Lead
description: Each project requires a strong Project Management and Governance, but in our agile cross-region-development-approach we need to have a Delivery Lead localized in our team and location to be responsible for the full delivery scope on our side.

name: Azure DevOps with CI\CD
description: Azure DevOps provides version control, reporting, requirements management, project management (for both agile software development and waterfall teams), automated builds, testing and release management capabilities. It covers the entire application lifecycle, and enables DevOps capabilities
